name: Good Shapes, Bad Shapes
description:
Good Shapes, Bad Shapes

Welcome to Good Shapes, Bad Shapes, a shadowy world of silhouette survival. Dodge a variety of wicked shapes who would steal your light while seeking out wandering orbs of light to keep your own power from waning. Try to stay alive for as long as you can in this challenging, atmospheric game.

Vote for us in Ludum Dare 46!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/good-shapes-bad-shapes
